皮埃尔·保罗·帕索里尼 Pier Paolo Pasolini

director.name: 米莫·卡罗普莱斯蒂 Mimmo Calopresti

this_title: Come si fa a non amare Pier Paolo Pasolini - Appunti per un film sull'immondezza
trans_title: 怎能不爱帕索里尼，关于一部与垃圾有关的小说的札记
introduction: In 1970 Pasolini filmed a documentary on the occasion of the strike of the garbage collectors on April 24 in Rome, he also filmed their faces involved in the discussions about the strike obtaining an anthropologically extraordinary image of an ignored humanity. Mimmo Calopresti has recovered the original material and has made a documentary about the garbage problem in a different way. He tries to talk about it as Pasolini himself used to do, looking at everything around us, including garbage.
